name: slide-generator
description: Claude Code powered slide generation with Marp

scripts.build:career-talk: bash scripts/build.sh slides/career-talk dist/career-talk.md && marp --theme ./theme.css --html -o dist/career-talk.html dist/career-talk.md
scripts.pdf:career-talk: bash scripts/build.sh slides/career-talk dist/career-talk.md && marp --theme ./theme.css --pdf --allow-local-files -o dist/career-talk.pdf dist/career-talk.md
scripts.pptx:career-talk: bash scripts/build.sh slides/career-talk dist/career-talk.md && marp --theme ./theme.css --pptx -o dist/career-talk.pptx dist/career-talk.md
